name: every-island
description: Ania's big dream is to collect postcards from every island in the world (at least those that have a postbox).

scripts.start: echo 'You may be interested in `npm run-script build` or `npm run-script dev`.'
scripts.styles: npm run-script styles/build && npm run-script styles/inline
scripts.svg/optimize: for svg in images/*.svg ; do mkdir -p "min/$( dirname "$svg" )" && node_modules/.bin/svgo -i "$svg" -o "min/$svg"; done
scripts.inline/helper: read FILEPATH; awk 'match($0, /^(\s*)<!-- inline:([^ ]*) -->/, m) { getline line < m[2]; print m[1] "<!-- inline:" m[2] " --> " line; next; }; 1;' < "${FILEPATH}" > "${FILEPATH}--inlining" && mv "${FILEPATH}--inlining" "${FILEPATH}"
scripts.inline/preview: npm run-script inline/preview/index && npm run-script inline/preview/post
scripts.inline: npm run-script inline/template && npm run-script inline/preview
scripts.svg: npm run-script svg/optimize && npm run-script inline
scripts.build: npm install && npm run-script styles && npm run-script svg && npm run-script copy-template
scripts.dev: npm run-script styles/watch & browser-sync start --files="style/*.css, *.html" --server --index preview.html

author: Marek ‘saji’ Augustynowicz
